Greetings everybody!

My name is Garima, and i am from Sonipat. I am currently pursuing a degree in English literature.In my free time i enjoy reading books and keeping up with the latest news in English literature .I enjoy listening soft songs in my free time.
I am a hardworking and dedicated individual and always try to give my best in everything i do .I am looking forward to a great academic journey and hope to make the most of the opportunities that come my way.
